trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter for expression binding collections.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換器的運算式繫結集合中。

trans-unit.source: The ExpressionsCollectionConverter class converts an <xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBindingCollection> to a string for the property-editing grid at design time, which always appears as an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: ExpressionsCollectionConverter 類別轉換<xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBindingCollection>為字串在設計階段屬性編輯方格中，這一律會顯示為空字串 ("")。</xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBindingCollection>

trans-unit.source: A designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], uses the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor> class implementations with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionsCollectionEditor> and ExpressionsCollectionConverter classes to set the expression bindings for control properties at design time, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlPersister> to persist the expressions for run time.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，會使用<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor>類別的實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionsCollectionEditor>和 ExpressionsCollectionConverter 類別，在設計階段設定控制項屬性的運算式繫結和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlPersister>保存執行階段的運算式。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlPersister> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionsCollectionEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Expression strings reference a localizable resource, an application setting, a connection string, or a custom expression type.
trans-unit.target: 運算式字串參考可當地語系化的資源、 應用程式設定、 連接字串或自訂運算式型別。

trans-unit.source: The expression string is bound to the control property at design time, and then used at run time to determine the value for the property.
trans-unit.target: 運算式字串的繫結至控制項屬性在設計階段，而且在執行階段中用來判斷屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您應該永遠不會直接存取型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended only for use by an <xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBindingCollection> object at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>僅供使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBindingCollection>在設計階段物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBindingCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionsCollectionConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionsCollectionConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Converts an expression binding collection to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之類型的運算式繫結集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that indicates the component or control the expression binding collection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>所屬的物件，表示元件或控制項繫結集合的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that can be used to provide additional culture information.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>可以用來提供額外的文化特性資訊的物件。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If destinationType is not of type , the object produced by the type conversion; otherwise, if destinationType is a string, an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果 destinationType 的類型不是，物件所產生的型別轉換; 否則如果 destinationType 為字串時，空字串 ("")。
